verbs.description: [ARG1: interior dept computer] [V: infected] [ARG2: with malware] [ARGM-TMP: after employee surfed porn sites] the interior department whose compromised systems gave the hackers access to opm databases more than three years ago still has gaps in its cyber defenses according to its inspector general united states geological survey office of the inspector general computer sylvia burns interior dept ocio united states department of the interior usgs deputy ig mary kendall ig
